get.description: An catalog of products is a data set that, in addition to information about products and its attributes, may also contain inventory status information. This data set contains information related to products. Only active products are displayed.

artikli.opis: 26" / 66 cm, 16:9 LCD TV rezolucije 1366 x 768 px (HD ready), 2x HDMI, MPEG-4, USB

get.description: Retrieval of product documents via document FK

get.summary: Products – retrieval of products with additional products

get.summary: Products – retrieval of products with translations

id.description: ID of product in Luceed (1st part of primary key in Luceed)

sid.description: Server ID (ID location) in Luceed (2nd part of primary key in Luceed)

artikl_uid.description: ID and SID of product (id,sid) as one string (unique key of product in Luceed)

usluga.description: Is the product a service (D/N); Usluga="D"

eol.description: Has the product reach the end of its life cycle „end of life" (EOL)="D"

webshop.description: Is the product offered on the webshop (D/N); Webshop="D"

multipack.description: Is the product multipack (the product consists of several parts that do not appear in the invoice but are accounted for in the background; used in hotel industry)

trgovacka_roba.description: Is the product a merchandise (D/N); Trgovačka roba="D"

bundle.description: Is the product a bundle (the product consists of several parts that appear on the document)

osiguranje.description: Is the product marked as insurance (D/N); Osiguranje="D"

porezna_tarifa_b2b.description: Link of tax rate to the B2B application

supergrupa_artikla.description: Product supergroup code (the group over the overgroup of the product)

supergrupa_artikla_naziv.description: Name of supergroup of product (the group over the overgroup of the product)

grupa_artikla_uid.description: Unique key of product group in Luceed

grupa_artikla_b2b.description: Product's group link with B2B application

grupa_artikla_b2b_naziv.description: Name of product's group link with B2B application

marker_b2b.description: Marker's unique key for B2B application

referentna__velicina_uid.description: Reference size's unique key in Luceed

referentna__velicina_b2b.description: Reference size's link with B2B application

pakiranje.description: Quantity of products in commercial packaging

pakiranje_jm.description: Unit of measure of commercial packaging

pakiranje_trans_jm.description: Unit of measure of transport packaging

upozorenje.description: Warning that comes with adding product to receipt and other documents

osnovni__artikl_b2b.description: Base product's link with B2B application

mpc_prvi.description: The first retail price of the product

raspolozivo_kol.description: Available quantity of product (Inventory status minus reservations)

stanje.description: Informacija ima li artikla ima na stanju (da/ne) Information if product is in stock (yes/no)

artikl_pj_visible.description: Is the product visible in the active BU (Business Unit)

artikl_pj_mpc.description: Retail price defined for active BU. If there is no information, the default retail is valid.

artikl_pj_valuta_naziv.description: Currency name defined for active BU

ima_serijski_broj.description: Does the product have serial numbers (yes/no)

modified.description: Date and time of product data change

keub.description: KEUB (Book of consumption of flour) category

koeficijent_statisticke_jm.description: The coefficient of the statistical unit of the product measure

postotak_alkohola.description: Percentage of alcohol contained in the product

postotak_kave.description: Percentage of coffee contained in the product

nc.description: The purchase price of the product

nc_zavisni_trosak.description: The dependent cost of the purchase price of the product

proizvodac_uid.description: Manufacturer's unique key defined on product
